headline: Should You Reconsider AMD as AI Chip Demand Fuels a 77% Rally in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is really worth the buzz? You are not alone, and digging into the stock's valuation could reveal some surprises. AMD's share price has soared an impressive 77.6% year-to-date despite some choppiness, including a 4.2% dip over the past week and a 17.5% pullback in the last month. Much of this recent volatility comes in the wake of industry news about surging demand for AI-focused chips, as well as chip supply chain developments grabbing headlines...
